name: Berry Kiss Body & Hair Perfume Mist
categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Fruity Florals.Key Notes:Wild Berries, Marshmallow, Cashmere.Fragrance Description:A fruity floral body mist that smells like a berry-filled garden. This sweet scent gets its juiciness from fresh blueberries, plums, and sugar-coated marshmallow, with softness from skin musks and cashmere..About the Bottle:A slim, fluted mist that adds a fanciful edge to your everyday spray. This one is all about the hearts, berries, and flowers. The Strawberry Fields print is a signature design, chosen from over 2,000 in the LoveShackFancy print and lace library, to decorate this purple-magenta bottle, which is topped with a matching metallic cap..About the Fragrance:An overflowing field of berries and marshmallows made to be sprayed all over, anytime..Clean
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Water (Aqua/Eau), Fragrance (Parfum), Dipropylene Glycol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Citronellol, Limonene, Linalool...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..Spray on your hair, your neck, the tops of your shoulders, the backs of your knees, braids, buns, and blowouts. Spritz Anywhere you want to smell amazing
